item.title: Auto TLS
item.description: TIL: hl_inline=true 1curl -k --resolve <collaborator url>:443:$(dig learning.greensoluce.com +short| tail -1) https://<collaborator url> -H "Host: learning.greensoluce.com" 

item.title: Databricks Privilege Escalation
item.description: The following write-ups detail a privilege escalation vulnerability in Databricks that I discovered during my time at a previous employer. Due to contractual obligations, the post only contains links to external resources. For political reasons there are three versions of the same write-up with varying degrees of detail. Securing Databricks cluster init scripts Securing Databricks cluster init scripts SEC Consult mirror Bypassing cluster isolation in Databricks Platform

item.title: Post 1
item.description: Hello World some code: import requests try: for i in range(1,20): r = requests.get(f"https://www.google.de/{i}") print(r.text[:20]) except KeyboardInterrupt: pass

item.title: About
item.description: Simple, mostly security oriented, personal blog.
